summary: A NULL Pointer Dereference vulnerability in the slapd component of OpenLDAP allows a remote attacker to cause a Denial of Service.
details: A NULL Pointer Dereference vulnerability in the slapd component of OpenLDAP allows a remote attacker to cause a Denial of Service.

summary: A denial of service vulnerability exists in OpenLDAP slap_init_listener when parsing listener URLs, allowing an attacker to cause a crash.
details: A denial of service vulnerability exists in OpenLDAP slap_init_listener when parsing listener URLs, allowing an attacker to cause a crash.

summary: A null pointer dereference in the slapd component of OpenLDAP allows an unauthenticated attacker to cause a denial of service.
details: A null pointer dereference in the slapd component of OpenLDAP allows an unauthenticated attacker to cause a denial of service.

summary: A null pointer dereference vulnerability in the slapadd utility of OpenLDAP can be triggered with a crafted ldif file, leading to a denial of service.
details: A null pointer dereference vulnerability in the slapadd utility of OpenLDAP can be triggered with a crafted ldif file, leading to a denial of service.

summary: A null pointer dereference vulnerability in the slapadd utility of OpenLDAP can be triggered with a crafted ldif file, leading to a denial of service.
details: A null pointer dereference vulnerability in the slapadd utility of OpenLDAP can be triggered with a crafted ldif file, leading to a denial of service.
